content: the back loop there are 16-13-13-16 58 stitches on the needles introduce the contrast colour and work the leg following row 13-49 of chart a note the decreases on row 26 32 42 work the decreases as follows on needle 1 knit the first stitch according to the chart knit 2 together follow chart until 3 stitches remain on needle 4 ssk slip two stitches knitwise individually then knit them together through the back loop and ​ knit the last stitch of the row © karola rehnström 2021 all rights reserved - for personal use only version 1 1 20210131 page 3 of 5 #generationssocks read the pattern from right to left and bottom to top each square represents a knit stitch stitches worked in the main colour are white and stitches worked in the contrast colour are brown heel flap cut the contrast colour yarn after finishing chart a knit the stitches from needle 1 onto needle 4 the heel flap is worked back and forth over these 26 stitches in the main colour turn your work over row 1 reverse side slip 1with yarn in front p25 turn row 2 front side slip 1 *k1 slip 1* repeat *-* until 1 stitch remains k1 turn ​ ​ ​ ​ repeat row 1-2 12 more times repeat row 1 once more turning the heel row 1 front side slip 1 *k1 slip 1* repeat *-* 6 more times k2 ssk slip two ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ stitches knitwise individually then knit them together through the back loop 7 stitches remain on the left needle turn over ​ row 2 reverse side slip 1 with yarn in front p8 purl 2 together 7 stitches remain on the left needle turn over row 3 front side slip 1 *k1 slip 1* repeat *-* two more times k2 ssk slip two ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ stitches knitwise individually then knit them together through the back loop turn over ​ row 4 reverse side slip 1 with yarn in front p8 purl 2 together turn over repeat row 3 and 4 for every row the stitches on the left needle will decrease by 1 repeat until only the middle 10 stitches remain k5 this is the new beginning of the row heel gusset using the main colour resume working in the round on all double pointed needles row 1 needle 1 - knit the remaining 5 stitches from the heel these are the first 5 stitches of the row pick up 15 stitches along the side of the heel flap onto needle 1 needle 2 and 3 - k26 needle 4 - pick up 15 stitches from the other side of the heel flap k5 there are 20-13-13-20 66 stitches on the needles row 2 needle 1- k5 knit 12 through the back loop knit 2 together knit 1 through the back loop needles 2 and 3 - k26 needle 4 - knit 1 through the back loop ssk slip two
